text: Lack of EverythingEverything has been difficult for a few years now  It s hard to really feel any emotion though  and any emotion I do feel is always negative  I ve cut my stomach so nobody sees  and drawn on my arm in ways where people think it s just because of boredom  I don t want to be here anymore It started when I was about nine  I moved schools and kept in contact with one of my friends  who happened to be incredibly suicidal  I tried to talk to her  but I eventually became so terrified that I cut contact with her after she texted me a suicide message  I don t know if she s still alive or not I went to the internet for support  and managed to make a few friends  Things got a little better when I went to the new school and talked to people  despite my ways of taking out my anger on others  I can t control it  Haven t been able to  even to this day Things get better  and then they get worse than ever before  My mom s smoking got worse  my dad s ranting got more frequent  and they argued louder  Still do  My older brother struggled to cope  and didn t know I was suffering too  From blaming myself for the death of a friend and so many other things A lot happened between then and now  but for the past half year  I haven t felt anything  I have two close friends  both with pasts just as bad as mine  but I still can t see a point to life  One is on the verge of suicide  and the other is almost out of his depression  I don t understand how they re so bad  or how they ve managed to get so far  There isn t much of a point to life I m one in nearly eight billion  after all  The loss of my life wouldn t change much I don t want to be here anymore  I ve tried two times now to overdose  tired two times to get some kind of therapy  It won t work So I ve come here seeking some form of help
